attributes.action: REVISIT THE ENDOWMENT SHORTFALLS ISSUE OF PRE 1988 POLICY HOLDERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Endowment shortfalls issue apertaining to those who had taken out Endowments pre 1988 needs to be re looked by the Govt as the laws do not afford us any help whatsoever,not even by FSO FSA.The outdated consumer protection act laws need updating.
Many like me who cannot afford to remortgage stand to even lose their homes.Yet again the big financial houses WIN, this is unfair the Govt should afford us some compensation and help us.

rejection.details: Please resubmit without BLOCK CAPS, as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
